channel.title: Sendquest

item.title: Sendquest
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

all the sendmessage ect have to be the same spaces.

says 8145
then 8147

if you want a space their, you have to do another sendmessage with 8146 but leave it blank.

i think thats your problem.

Read full topic

        QuestHelpMenu();

[/code]
alter it to fit your needs

item.title: Sendquest
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

ok ive changed code to this:

public void commandMenu() {

    sendQuest("Commands", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("Command list", 8145);
    sendQuest("player commands:", 8146);
    sendQuest("::afk", 8147);
    sendQuest("::starter", 8148);
    sendQuest("::home", 8149);
    sendQuest("::train", 8150);
sendQuest("::shops", 8151);
sendQuest("::pkbox", 8152);
sendQuest("::teampk", 8153);
sendQuest("::skill", 8154);
sendQuest("::kbd", 8155);
sendQuest("::jad", 8156);
sendQuest("::kq", 8157);
sendQuest("::slayer", 8158);
sendQuest("::barrows", 8159);
sendQuest("::players", 8160);
sendQuest("mod+ commands:", 8161);
sendQuest("::xteleto", 8162);
sendQuest("::normal", 8163);
sendQuest("::ownz", 8164);
sendQuest("::alert", 8165);
sendQuest("::sz", 8166);
sendQuest("::mod", 8167);
sendQuest("::modlook", 8168);
sendQuest("admin+ commands:", 8169);
sendQuest("::xteletome", 8170);
sendQuest("::pnpc", 8171);
sendQuest("::pickup", 8172);
sendQuest("::banuser", 8173);
sendQuest("::adminlook", 8174);
sendQuest("::god", 8175);
sendQuest("::noclip", 8176);
sendQuest("::owner+ commands", 8177);
sendQuest("::alltome", 8178);
sendQuest("::eat", 8179);
sendQuest("::xslime", 8180);
sendQuest("::ownerlook", 8181);
sendQuest("::ipban", 8182);
sendQuest("DO NOT PNPC OVER 3500!", 8183);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
	
}

i dont really care about spaces now tbh im really annoyed and i just want it done.

i tried adding in a command to use that sendquest thing but it doesnt work can anyone help?

Read full topic

item.title: Sendquest
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

if you wanted a space you would have to do something like this

("title", 8183); (" ", 8184); (" ", 8185); ("commands", 8186); (" ", 8187); ("::afk ", 8183);

That would look something like this
title

Commands

::afk

you get the point?

Read full topic

item.title: Sendquest
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

looks ok
you might wana put a couple of lines between the title and the rest so i looks neater

Right now its gona look something like this

Commands
Command list
Player command
::afk
::starter
::home
::train
ect

Make it look more professional add some color too it very easy stuff to do!
White and green go well together on my server
[red]n[/red][green]o[/green][red]t[/red] [green]s[/green][red]o[/red] [green]m[/green][red]u[/red][green]c[/green][red]h[/red] on this site

item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

where in my client.java should i add this send quest also is the coding right? is there any errors that u can see?

public void commandMenu() {

    sendQuest("Commands", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("Command list", 8145);
    sendQuest("player commands:", 8147);
    sendQuest("::afk", 8148);
